Html:
UICompositionQuickStart exception right after shell is displayed (or during, I don't know)

It says that it's unable to load type for module UIComposition.EmployeeModule.

How can I fix it?

Debugging this modular applications is can't of hard, maybe I'll get a grasp on it later.

Hi,

Have you tried setting the UIComposition.Web project as the StartUp Project?, I believe this could be related to the error you are mentioning.

More information about this can be found in the Building and Running the QuickStart section of the corresponding QuickStart:

To build and run the QuickStart

  •     In Visual Studio, open the solution file QuickStarts\UIComposition \UICompositionQuickstart.sln.
  •     Right-click the UIComposition.Web project, and then click Set as StartUp Project.
  •     Right-click the Default.html file from the UIComposition.Web project, and then click Set as Start Page.
  •     On the Build menu, click Rebuild Solution.
  •     Press F5 to run the QuickStart.

Additionally, you could also check that you have the requirements mentioned in this same section.

Please let us know if you could solve this problem,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
